changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE "artifact_release" ( "id" UUID NOT NULL, "ts" TIMESTAMPTZ(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), "created_at" TIMESTAMPTZ(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), "deleted_at" TIMESTAMPTZ(3) NULL, "version" VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, "channel" VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, "recommended" BOOL NOT NULL, "notes" TEXT NULL, "published_at" TIMESTAMPTZ(3) NULL, "metadata" JSONB NOT NULL, "artifact_id" UUID NOT NULL, -- PRIMARY KEY ("id"), FOREIGN KEY ("artifact_id") REFERENCES "artifact" ("id") ON DELETE CASCADE ); CREATE INDEX "idx_artifact_release_artifact_published_at_active" ON "artifact_release" ("artifact_id", "published_at") WHERE "deleted_at" IS NULL; CREATE INDEX "idx_artifact_release_artifact_recommended_active" ON "artifact_release" ("artifact_id") WHERE "deleted_at" IS NULL AND "recommended" = TRUE;
